alert.note: Alert for Palo Pinto; Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 2:44PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Parker and eastern Palo Pinto Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 242 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a pair of strong thunderstorms, one near Lake Mineral Wells, and the other near Cool. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mineral Wells, Brock, Cool, and Lake Mineral Wells around 250 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 380 and 405. A gust to 47 mph was recorded at Mineral Wells Airport with these storms. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
